text:
@Independent What the alternative media has been saying from the state is finally coming out

Fauci funded bieweapon research and moved it abroad when it became illegal in the US. FACT

That research was into Coronavirus (gain of function / hybrids / transmission to humans)

Where? WUHAN

entity.description: This page is a timeline of Tweets with the latest information and updates on COVID-19 from experts, journalists, health authorities and other trusted sources from around the world. For more on COVID-19, visit: twitter.com/explore/tabs/covid-19
